title: Appmobi Secure Mobile Platform
tooltip: A simple structure app with example hooks for using the Appmobi secure development platform.
description: [Android only - see README for details]. A simple structure app with example hooks for using the Appmobi secure development platform. Using this sample requires a valid Appmobi account. Signup now for free on our public cloud. You also must edit the Appmobi Secure Mobile Platform plugin variables to point to your Appmobi app within the XDK Plugin Management section.
